docFetchError: Ahh, the network is out of business, try to refresh again~
customSqlEnabledTip: Check this to use custom SQL for browsing, instead of predefined conditions
sqlContentTip: Custom SQL, note that it must be a valid JSON array, for example: [{"name":"默认","sql":"sql1"]
customSqlEmpty: Custom SQL is detected to be enabled, please set it. Custom SQL cannot be empty.
autoResetOnStartupTip: When the plugin starts, automatically clear visit records.
